description.en:
Our decentralized marketplace brings you the FREEDOM in online marketplaces, a platform with a high level of community organization and intelligent allocation of resources. Martkist brings you to the real world of decentralized anarchy.

Characterized by efficient community organization via our masternode governance system, a long-term goal of using the sha256 proof of work mining algorithm. Our decentralized marketplace gives you access to a decentralized economy with an elaborate and transparent budget proposal voting system. All this is supported by the new Z-DAG protocol, which gives our network a high throughput (TPS) across all its services and products.
